name: Fănică Luca
description: '''Fănică Luca''' (born '''Ştefan Luca Iordache'''; 5 April 1894 – 26 October 1968) was a [[Romani people|Romani]]-[[Romanians|Romanian]] musician and a Romanian [[pan pipe]] (''[[nai (pan flute)|nai]]'') virtuoso, who was the first to make this instrument popular outside his own country.
